Hypotheses and Specific Predictions: $DOY_{25}$ is negatively correlated with early spring T.
$DOY_{50}$  is negatively correlated with early spring T.
$DOY_{75}$  is negatively correlated with early spring T.
$DOY$ of max growth rate is negatively correlated with early spring T
Peak growing season length ($DOY_{75}$ -$DOY_{25}$) is positively correlated with early spring T.
max growth rate is independent of early spring T.
Annual growth is positively correlated with early spring T.
